title: discoloured screen
content: The Pixel 4a (5G) phone purchased on 05-Nov-2020 is now showing discoloured screen and the pixels are spreading all around the screen, now the phone is not in a usable state, it started off with the discolouration around the front camera and slowly spreaded around the entire screen, I need replacement of this device the EMEI number is 358761101077043
